text: Mata kare wa, arra ni tsuite yokoshimana kangae o motsu nise shinja ya on'na-tachi, tashinkyo to wa otoko mo on'na mo chobatsu nasa reru. Kare-ra wa arra ni tsuite, warui kenkai de okusoku suru monodearu. Korera no mono ni wa hi un ga megutte kite, arra wa kare-ra ni gekido sa re, Takashi rare, kare-ra no tame ni jigoku o junbi nasa reru. Warui kaeri-shodearu
